name: Skipping - Standard
how_to_perform:
1. Start by bending your knees and swinging one foot forward while keeping your other foot on the ground.
2. Push off the ground with the foot that was on the ground, causing you to jump into the air.
3. Land softly on both feet, bending your knees once again to absorb the impact of landing.
4. Repeat the motion with the opposite leg, swapping which foot is swinging forward and which is holding on the ground.
5. Continue alternating legs as quickly as possible while keeping your upper body relaxed and your back straight.
6. As you build speed, try to maintain a rhythmic cadence and focus on pumping your arms in coordination with the movement of your legs,
7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions or duration.
short_summary: Skipping is a cardio exercise that primarily works the cardiovascular system, improving endurance and stamina while engaging various lower body muscles
